metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10745 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Pallets Jinja before 2.8.1, str.format allows a sandbox escape.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10745` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-jinja2 - 2.8-1ubuntu0.1
python3-jinja2 - 2.8-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jinja2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8-1ubuntu0.1').
